	function showERModal() {
		var $erData = $('#loadedERRequests');
		$erData.modal('show').on('shown.bs.modal', function() {
			$('#loadedERRequests .modal-content').scrollTop(0);
		});
	}

	function loadERData(data) {
		var namePair = data.split(",");
		var i = 0;
		for (i = 0; i != namePair.length; i++) {
			var item = namePair[i];
			if (item == '' || typeof item === "undefined") {} else {
				if (item.indexOf('=') != -1) {
					var small = item.split('=');
					if (small[0] == 'erFirstName') {
						$('#erFirstName').val(small[1]);
					} else if (small[0] == 'erLastName') {
						$('#erLastName').val(small[1]);
					} else if (small[0] == 'erUserId') {
						$('#erUserId').val(small[1]);
					} else {
						setERValue(small);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	function setERValue(value) {
		var name = value[0];
		var val = value[1];
		if (ertextFields.indexOf(name) != -1) {
			$('#' + name).val(val);
		} else {
			if (val == "true") {
				$('#' + name).prop('checked', true);
				if (name == 'er_notApplicableDataForm') {
					$('#er_individual').prop('disabled', true);
					$('#er_aggregate').prop('disabled', true);
				}
			} else {
				$('#' + name).prop('checked', false);
				if (name == 'er_notApplicableDataForm') {
					$('#er_individual').prop('disabled', false);
					$('#er_aggregate').prop('disabled', false);
				}
			}
			erOtherFieldWatcher(name, val);
		}
	}

	function erOtherFieldWatcher(name, value) {
		var otherCheckbox = ['er_otherType', 'er_otherAnalysis', 'er_yeast', 'er_bacteria', 'er_nonHuman', 'er_snpArrayData', 'er_expressionArray', 'er_methylationArray', 'er_arrayDerive', 'er_microarrayData', 'er_sequenceData', 'er_somaticSnv', 'er_arrayCgh', 'er_wholeGenome', 'er_wholeExome', 'er_targetGenome', 'er_targetExome', 'er_wholeTranscriptome', 'er_targetTrabscriptome', 'er_epigenomicMark', 'er_sanger', 'er_rrna', 'er_legalRestricton', 'er_otherJust', 'er_otherConsent'];
		var otherField = ['specifyOtherType', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteriaSpecies', 'noHumanOther', 'numSNP', 'numExpression', 'numMethylation', 'numDerivedGenotype', 'numMicroarrayData', 'numSquenceData', 'numSomaticSnv', 'numArrayCgh', 'numWholeGenome', 'numWholeExome', 'numTargetGenome', 'numTargetedExome', 'numWholeTranscriptome', 'numTargetedTranscriptome', 'numEpigenomic', 'numSanger', 'numRrna', 'er_describedLegal', 'er_specifiedOtherJust', 'er_specifiedOtherConsent'];
		var index = otherCheckbox.indexOf(name);
		if (index >= 0) {
			if (value == 'true') {
				$('#' + otherField[index]).prop('disabled', false);
			} else {
				$('#' + otherField[index]).prop('disabled', true);
			}
		}
	}

	function loadBranchOptionString() {
		$.ajax({
			url: '/api/naci/gds/getAllBranch',
			beforeSend: function(xhr) {
				xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
			},
			data: {},
			async: false,
			dataType: 'json',
			complete: handleResponse,
			error: handleError
		});

		function handleResponse(response) {
			var result = response.responseJSON.result;
			var val = "";
			for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
				val = val + "<option value='" + result[i].value + "'>" + result[i].label + "</option>";
			}
			$('#piBranch').html(val);
			$('#pBranch').html(val);
		}

		function handleError(response) {
			console.error(response);
			alert('ERROR');
		}
	}
	$scope.viewSignIC = function(approval_id, request_id, ic_id){
		$('#refresh').val('0');
		loadICDisplay(approval_id,request_id, ic_id, 'sign');
	};

	function loadICDisplay(approval_id, request_id, ic_id, indicator){
		$('#displayICId').html(ic_id);
		var data = {
			requestedid: request_id
		};
		var request = {
			method: 'POST',
			url: '/api/naci/gds/getSubmittedICRequestData',
			beforeSend: function(xhr) {
				xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
			},
			headers: {
				'Content-Type': 'application/json'
			},
			data: data
		};
		$http(request).then(handleResp, handleErr);

		function handleResp(response) {
			var result = response.data.result;
			var comments = parse(result.comments);
			var variables = result.variables;
			var i = 0;
			for (i = 0; i < icNames.length; i++) {
				if (icNames[i] == 'data_access') {
					if (variables[icNames[i]] == 'unrestricted') {
						$("input[name=dataAccessBox1][value='unrestricted']").prop("checked", true);
					} else {
						$("input[name=dataAccessBox1][value='controlled-access']").prop("checked", true);
					}
				} else if (icNames[i] == 'display') {
					if (variables[icNames[i]] == 'yes') {
						$('#displayBox1').prop('checked', true);
					} else {
						$('#displayBox1').prop('checked', false);
					}
				} else if (icNames[i] == 'frequency') {
					if (variables[icNames[i]] == 'yes') {
						$('#frequenceBox1').prop('checked', true);
					} else {
						$('#frequenceBox1').prop('checked', false);
					}
				} else if (icNames[i] == 'consent_group') {
					$('#' + icNames[i] + '1').val(variables[icNames[i]]);
				} else {
					$('#' + icNames[i] + '1').html(variables[icNames[i]]);
				}
			}
			$('#sample_time').val(variables.sampleTime);
			$('#sample_consent').val(variables.sampleConsent);
			$('#hiddenRequestId').val(request_id);
			$('#hiddenApprovalId').val(approval_id);
			if (comments.length > 137) {
				$('#commentReviewICId1').html('');
				$('#commentReviewICId1').html(comments);
				$('#pre_comments_ic_div').show();
				$('#ic_modal_content').attr('style', 'height:800px; overflow-y:auto; overflow-x: hidden;')
			}
			$('#submitButton1').hide();
			if(indicator == 'sign'){
				$('#signButton1').show();
				$('#closeButton1').hide();
				$('#comments_ic_div').show();
			}else{
				$('#signButton1').hide();
				$('#closeButton1').show();
				$('#comments_ic_div').hide();
			}
			loadConsentGroupData();
			//if(variables.sampleTime == 'yes' && variables.sampleConsent == 'no'){
			$('#insDiv').show();
			//}else{
			//	$('#insDiv').hide();
			//}
			$('#displayICRequests').modal('show').on('shown.bs.modal', function() {
				$('#displayICRequests .modal-content').scrollTop(0);
			});
		}

		function handleErr(response) {
			console.error(response);
			alert('ERROR');
		}
	}

	function saveUser(userData, gdsId, access){
		var data1 = {
			data: userData,
			gds_id: gdsId,
			access: access,
			action: 'add'
		};
		var request = {
			method: 'POST',
			url: '/api/naci/gds/saveUser',
			beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
			headers: {
				'Content-Type': 'application/json'
			},
			data: data1
		};
		$http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError);
		function handleResponse(response) {
			var result = response.data.result;
		}
		function handleError(response) {
			console.error(response);
			alert('ERROR');
		}		
	}	

	function encodeDecodeData(data, flag){
		var Base64={_keyStr:"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=",
								encode:function(e){
									var t="";var n,r,i,s,o,u,a;var f=0;e=Base64._utf8_encode(e);
									while(f<e.length){
										n=e.charCodeAt(f++);
										r=e.charCodeAt(f++);
										i=e.charCodeAt(f++);
										s=n>>2;
										o=(n&3)<<4|r>>4;
										u=(r&15)<<2|i>>6;
										a=i&63;
										if(isNaN(r)){
											u=a=64
										}else if(isNaN(i)){
											a=64
										}
										t=t+this._keyStr.charAt(s)+this._keyStr.charAt(o)+this._keyStr.charAt(u)+this._keyStr.charAt(a);
									}
									return t
								},
								decode:function(e){
									var t="";
									var n,r,i;
									var s,o,u,a;
									var f=0;e=e.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9+/=]/g,"");
									while(f<e.length){
										s=this._keyStr.indexOf(e.charAt(f++));
										o=this._keyStr.indexOf(e.charAt(f++));
										u=this._keyStr.indexOf(e.charAt(f++));
										a=this._keyStr.indexOf(e.charAt(f++));
										n=s<<2|o>>4;
										r=(o&15)<<4|u>>2;
										i=(u&3)<<6|a;
										t=t+String.fromCharCode(n);
										if(u!=64){
											t=t+String.fromCharCode(r);
										}
										if(a!=64){
											t=t+String.fromCharCode(i);
										}
									}
									t=Base64._utf8_decode(t);
									return t;
								},
								_utf8_encode:function(e){
									e=e.replace(/rn/g,"n");
									var t="";
									for(var n=0;n<e.length;n++){
										var r=e.charCodeAt(n);
										if(r<128){
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r);
										}else if(r>127&&r<2048){
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r>>6|192);
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r&63|128)
										}else{
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r>>12|224);
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r>>6&63|128);
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r&63|128);
										}
									}
									return t;
								},
								_utf8_decode:function(e){
									var t="";
									var n=0;
									var r=0,c1=0,c2=0;
									while(n<e.length){
										r=e.charCodeAt(n);
										if(r<128){
											t+=String.fromCharCode(r);
											n++;
										}else if(r>191&&r<224){
											c2=e.charCodeAt(n+1);
											t+=String.fromCharCode((r&31)<<6|c2&63);
											n+=2;
										}else{
											c2=e.charCodeAt(n+1);
											c3=e.charCodeAt(n+2);
											t+=String.fromCharCode((r&15)<<12|(c2&63)<<6|c3&63);
											n+=3;
										}
									}
									return t;
								}
							 };

		var result = '';
		if(flag == 'encode'){
			result = Base64.encode(data);
		}else if(flag == 'decode'){
			result = Base64.decode(data);
		}else{
			result = 'ERROR Method';
		}

		return result;
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>/*disable bk logo */

	var session_id = gs.getSessionToken();
	var my_sys_id = gs.getUserID();
	data.access = '';
	var userName = '';
	  var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        user_item.addQuery('sys_id', my_sys_id);
        user_item.query();
        user_item.next();
	if(user_item != null){
	   userName = user_item.last_name + ", " + user_item.first_name;
	}

	data.info = {
		userId: my_sys_id,
		sessionId: session_id,
		userName: userName
	};

	data.tasks = [];
	data.userTasks = [];
	data.icSubmittedTasks=[];
	
	data.submittedTasks = [];
	data.icTasks = [];
	data.icSignTasks = [];
	
	//get PI sign record
			var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item");
				gr1.addQuery("short_description", "CCR GDSP Intramural Certification");
				gr1.query();	
				gr1.next();
				var cat_item_id = gr1.getValue('sys_id');


			 var gr_approval_items = GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
			 var req_item = gr_approval_items.addJoinQuery('sc_req_item','document_id','sys_id');
			 req_item.addCondition('cat_item', cat_item_id);
       gr_approval_items.addQuery('approver', my_sys_id); 
			 //gr_approval_items.addQuery('document_id.request.requested_for', my_sys_id);
			 gr_approval_items.addQuery('source_table','sc_req_item'); 
			 gr_approval_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');  
			 gr_approval_items.query();
			 while (gr_approval_items.next()){
				 var orginId = '';
				 var tickerNum = '';
				 var org_ticket_num = '';
				 var version = '';
				 var hasParent = '';
				 var selectedOrginId = '';

				 var docId = gr_approval_items.document_id;

				 selectedOrginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.contact_type;
				 if(selectedOrginId == '' || selectedOrginId === undefined || selectedOrginId == 'Web' ){
							orginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
							org_ticket_num = gr_approval_items.document_id.number;
							hasParent = 'false';
					}else{
						 var orgIds = selectedOrginId.split("=");
						 var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
						 gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
						 gr_tracking_item.query();

						 if(gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
									gr_tracking_item.next();
									orginId = gr_tracking_item.u_orgid;
									org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number;
									version = orgIds[1];
									hasParent = 'true';
						 }else {
									orginId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
									org_ticket_num = gr_approval_items.document_id.number;
									hasParent = 'false';
						 }
					}

					var ticket_number = '';
					if(hasParent == 'true'){
							ticket_number = 'CCR_IC' + org_ticket_num.substring(8) + '-' + version;
					}else{
							ticket_number = "CCR_IC" + gr_approval_items.sysapproval.number.substring(8);
					}

					var stage_v = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name;		
							
					if(stage_v == 'Wait for PI to Sign'){
					   var items = {};
									items.ic_id = ticket_number;
									items.study_name = gr_approval_items.document_id.variables.study_name.toString();
									items.project_title = gr_approval_items.document_id.variables.project_title.toString();
									items.submitted_by = gr_approval_items.sysapproval.opened_by.name.toString();
									items.submitted_date = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_created_on.toString();
									items.status = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name.toString();
									items.last_update_date = gr_approval_items.sys_updated_on.toString();
									items.stage = stage_v.toString();
									items.sys_id = gr_approval_items.sys_id.toString();
									items.doc_id = gr_approval_items.document_id.toString();
									items.state = gr_approval_items.state.toString();					
						 data.icSignTasks.push(items);
					}
			}
	//end of PI sign Record 

	/*var gr_ic_sign_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	    gr_ic_sign_items.addQuery('requested_for', my_sys_id);
	    gr_ic_sign_items.addQuery()*/
	
	var ernames=['er_investigator','er_email','er_phone', 'er_date', 'er_projectNumber', 'er_projectName', 'er_simpleSize','er_prospective', 'er_restrospective', 'er_human', 'er_nonHuman', 'er_germLine','er_somatic', 'er_dnaType', 'er_rnaType',  'er_microbiome', 'er_mitochrondria', 'er_otherType', 'er_specifyOtherType', 'er_snpArrayData', 'er_numSNP', 'er_expressionArray', 'er_numExpression','er_methylationArray', 'er_numMethylation','er_arrayDerive', 'er_microarrayData', 'er_sequenceData', 'er_somaticSnv', 'er_arrayCgh', 'er_wholeGenome', 'er_wholeExome', 'er_targetGenome', 'er_targetExome', 'er_wholeTranscriptome', 'er_targetTrabscriptome', 'er_epigenomicMark', 'er_sanger', 'er_rrna', 'er_association', 'er_arrayDerivedExpression', 'er_rnaExpression', 'er_derivedMethylation', 'er_otherAnalysis', 'er_spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'er_individual', 'er_aggregate', 'er_notApplicableDataForm', 'orginId', 'version','er_rat', 'er_mouse', 'er_celegans', 'er_drosophila', 'er_yeast', 'er_yeastSpecies', 'er_bacteria', 'er_bacteriaSpecies','er_noHumanOther', 'er_numDerivedGenotype', 'er_numMicroarrayData', 'er_numSquenceData', 'er_numSomaticSnv', 'er_numArrayCgh','er_numWholeGenome', 'er_numWholeExome', 'er_numTargetGenome', 'er_numTargetedExome', 'er_numWholeTranscriptome', 'er_numTargetedTranscriptome', 'er_numEpigenomic', 'er_numSanger', 'er_numRrna','er_legalRestricton', 'er_describedLegal', 'er_informedConsent','er_otherJust', 'er_specifiedOtherJust','er_nonExistConsent','er_nonAddressConsent', 'er_nonAddressRisk','er_precludedConsent','er_otherConsent', 'er_specifiedOtherConsent', 'er_copyConsent', 'er_gpaAgreed', 'er_gpaDisagree', 'er_gpaUnclear','er_irbAgree', 'er_irbDisagree', 'er_alternative']; 
	data.erTasks = [];
	var gr_er_items = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
		  gr_er_items.addQuery('u_userid', my_sys_id);
	    gr_er_items.addQuery('u_application', 'GDS_ER');
		  gr_er_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
		  gr_er_items.query();
	while (gr_er_items.next()){
		var er = {};
		er.sys_create_on = gr_er_items.getValue('sys_created_on');	
		er.requested_for =  gr_er_items.getValue('u_apply_for_id');	
		var er_value = gr_er_items.getValue('u_value');
		var er_temp = er_value.split(",");
		var er_Value = {};
		var er_index = 0;
		for(er_index = 0; er_index < er_temp.length; er_index++){
         var er_vals = er_temp[er_index].split("=");
			   er_Value[er_vals[0]] = er_vals[1];
		}
		for(er_index = 0; er_index < ernames.length; er_index++){
			er[ernames[er_index]] = er_Value[ernames[er_index]];
		}
		er.project_name = er.er_projectName;
		er.investigator = er.er_investigator;
	  er.sys_id = gr_er_items.getDisplayValue("sys_id");
		data.erTasks.push(er);
	}	
	
})();

]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-31 16:20:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6f829e9adbf1b20054d8ff621f961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2193</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GDS main content</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_6f829e9adbf1b20054d8ff621f961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-27 18:02:57</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<br/>
<div>

                            </div>

                        </select>

                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12"> </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12" align='right' id="saveBt">
                            <input type="button" class="btn btn-primary active pull-right" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="saveProjectInformation(0)" value="Save" />
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-12" id="updateBt" style="display:none">

        </div>
        <!-- User Access Tab content -->

        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="acli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_user" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseUser" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseUser" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                        <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                        User Access</a>
                </h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_user" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseUser" role="tabpanel">
                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="access">
                    <div class="row">
                        <div class="row">  </div>
 
                        <div class="panel panel-default">
                            <div class="panel-heading">
                                <span class="panel-title">User(s) who can access the project</span>
                                <span class="pull-right">
                                  <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm active mt-0" id="accessBtn" ng-click="createNewUserAccess()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                                </span> 
                            </div>
                            <div class="panel-body">
                                 <!-- remove the input into dialog -->
                                <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                    <h4 class="section-title"> User Access Table</h4>
                                    <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.userTasks.length }}</span>
                                </div>
                                <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                    <thead>
                                        <tr>
                                            <td colspan="4">
                                                <form class="form-inline">
                                                    <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchUserAccess" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseUser"/>
                                                </form>
                                            </td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                            <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns3 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort3($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                                {{ column.label }}
                                                <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                            </th>
                                        </tr>
                                    </thead>
                                    <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.userTasks | filter:searchUserAccess" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination3.currentPage * c.pagination3.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination3.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination3.currentSize">
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.first_name }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.last_name }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.access }}</td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number" ng-show="c.data.access != 'Read_Only'"><button type='button' class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="removeUser(row.sys_id);">Remove</button> </td>
                                        <td class="ritm_number" ng-show="c.data.access == 'Read_Only'"><button type='button' class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" ng-click="removeUser(row.sys_id);" disabled>Remove</button> </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </table>


                                <!-- select the page size -->
                                <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                                    <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.userTasks.length > 0">
                                        <label for="pageSize16">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                                        <select id="pageSize16" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination3.currentSize = c.pagination3.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination3.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination3.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                                    </div>
                                </form>

                                <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                                <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination3.currentSize < c.data.userTasks.length">
                                    <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange3() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage3($index)">
                                        <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
          <!-- end of User Access -->
     


        <!-- GDSP Tab content -->
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="gdspli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_GDSP" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseGDSP" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseGDSP" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> Genomic Data Sharing Plan </a>
                </h4>
            </div>

            <div aria-labelledby="heading_GDSP" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseGDSP" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border">
										<div>
                      A <b>Genomic Data Sharing Plan</b> provides information on the proposed research that will generate large-scale human and non-human genomic data for which the GDS policy applies.   
                      <span class="pull-right">    
 												<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm active" id="gdspBt" ng-click="createGDSP()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                  		</span>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 20px;" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Draft GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.tasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>

                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="3">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftGDSP" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseGDSP"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.tasks | filter:searchDraftGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination.currentPage * c.pagination.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.editItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Edit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Remove
                                </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize17">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize17" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination.currentSize = c.pagination.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination.currentSize < c.data.tasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <!-- submitted Table -->
                    <br/><br><br>
                    <div id="submittedTable" style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Submitted GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.submittedTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="7">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedGDSP" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="submittedTable"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns1 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort1($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.submittedTasks | filter: searchSubmittedGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination1.currentPage * c.pagination1.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination1.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination1.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gdsp_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.principal_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                  <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewItem(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  View
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Resubmit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' &&  row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdraw(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Withdraw
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="report(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Export
                                </button>
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket" value="{{row.gdsp_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize18">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize18" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination1.currentSize = c.pagination1.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination1.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination1.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination1.currentSize < c.data.submittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange1() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage1($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end of GDSP -->
        <!-- IC Tab content ng-click='openIcQUestion()' -->
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="icli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_IC" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseIC" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseIC" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                              <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                              Institutional Certification
                            </a>
                </h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_IC" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseIC" role="tabpanel">
                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="IC">
                  <div>
                     An <b>Institutional Certification Memo certifies </b> that data submission and sharing is consistent with the informed consent of the study participants. 
                      <span class="pull-right">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm active" id="icBtn" ng-click="openIcQUestion()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                      </span>
                  </div>
                  <br/>
                  <div>
												<b>Institutional Certification Memo Clarifying Guidance</b> <br/>
                        More than one Institutional Certification Memo is required for research that began prior to August 31, 2015 (with and/or without consent [one memo for each instance]) and continued past August 31, 2015 when consent is mandatory.  
                    
                  </div>  
                  <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 20px;" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Draft ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="8">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftIC" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseIC"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns2 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort2($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icTasks | filter:searchDraftIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination2.currentPage * c.pagination2.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination2.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination2.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_from }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gpa_organization }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sd_organization }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewICItem(row.sys_id, row.sampleTime, row.sampleConsent)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Edit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Remove
                    </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize19">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize19" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination2.currentSize = c.pagination2.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination2.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination2.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination2.currentSize < c.data.icTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange2() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage2($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
 
                  <!-- IC submitted Table -->
                 <br/><br><br>
                 <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" id="submittedICTable" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Submitted ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length }}</span>
                 </div>
                 <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="9">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedIC" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="submittedICTable"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns4 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort4($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icSubmittedTasks | filter:searchSubmittedIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination4.currentPage * c.pagination4.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination4.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination4.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.ic_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_from }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Wait for PI to Sign'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for PI to sign"  title="Waiting for PI to sign"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>  
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review - SD Rejected'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewSubmittedIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      View
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayICResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Resubmit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdrawIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Withdraw
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' && row.approval != 'Wait for PI to Sign'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id, 'pi')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval == 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id, 'sd')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>

                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId_ic" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num_ic" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_ic" value="{{row.ic_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize20">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize20" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination4.currentSize = c.pagination4.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination4.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination4.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination4.currentSize < c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange4() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage4($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end of the IC tab createER() -->

        <!-- Exception Request Tab content  tempFunc   data-target="#collapseER"-->
        <!--
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="erli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_ER" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseER" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                                  Exception Request
                                </a>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm pull-right" id="erBtn" ng-click="createER()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                    <label>Coming Soon</label>
                </h4>

            </div>

            <div aria-labelledby="heading_ER" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseER" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="ER">
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4> Draft Exception Requests</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.erTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="9">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftER" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseER"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns5 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort5($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.erTasks | filter: searchDraftER" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination5.currentPage * c.pagination5.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination5.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination5.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.investigator }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="editERItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Edit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="removeERItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Remove
                    </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.erTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize21">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize21" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination5.currentSize = c.pagination5.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination5.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination5.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination5.currentSize < c.data.erTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange5() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage5($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
		-->
    </div>
</div>


<!--<div class="col-md-12"> </div>-->
<input type="hidden" id="hideGDSId" />
<input type="hidden" id="recId" />
<input type="hidden" id="access" />
<input type='hidden' id='refresh'/>
<input type='hidden' id='gdspStatus'/>
<input type='hidden' id='icStatus'/>


<div class="col-md-12"><label><a href='' class="home-link" ng-click='backToMain()'> Home    >   </a></label><span style="display:none;" id="titleButtomDiv"></span></div>

<!-- confirm modal -->
<div id="confirmDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                  <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
              </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="message"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesConfirmYesNo" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoConfirmYesNo" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="userConfirmDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                  <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
              </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageDeleteUser"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesConfirmUser" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoConfirmUser" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="withdrawDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageWithdraw"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesWithdraw" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoWithdraw" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="withdrawICDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageWithdrawIC"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesWithdrawIC" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoWithdrawIC" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="infoModal" class="modal fade">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <!--button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button -->
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmOk" class="modal-title">Information</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageInfo"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnOkConfirm" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">OK</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="loading" class="overlay" style="display:none;">
  <div class="spinner" style="width: 25px; height: 25px">
  	<svg version="2.0" class="spinner" width="25" height="25">
      <circle cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="10" fill="transparent" stroke="#ccc" stroke-width="2.5" />
      <path fill="transparent" stroke="#666" stroke-width="2.5" d="M 12.5 2.5 a 10 10 0 0 1 10 10" />
    </svg>
  </div>
  <span>Processing</span>
</div>

<div id="addUserAccessDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">User Access</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                 <div class="row" id="error" style="display:none;"> </div>
                 <div class="row">
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                           <lable for="userName">User Name</lable>
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-6 ui-front">
                          <input type="text" class="form-control" id="userName" style="width:90%;" aria-labelledby="userName"/>
                          <input type='hidden' id='userFirstName' /><input type='hidden' id='userLastName' /><input type='hidden' id='userId' />
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                          Read-Write <input type="radio" name="access" value="Read_and_Write" aria-labelledby="userName"/>
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                          Read-only <input type="radio" name="access" value="Read_Only" aria-labelledby="userName" checked/>
                     </div>
								</div>                
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnAddUserAccess" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Add</button>
                <button id="btnCancelUserAccess" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Cancel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: m2m_sp_widget_dependency_0429c23cdbd2720054d8ff621f9619cd
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="m2m_sp_widget_dependency"><m2m_sp_widget_dependency action="DELETE"><sp_dependency display_value="GDSP JSPDF include">622706f8dbd2720054d8ff621f96194d</sp_dependency><sp_widget display_value="GDSP Report Page Content">01160574db12720054d8ff621f96192a</sp_widget><sys_class_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-20 20:18:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0429c23cdbd2720054d8ff621f9619cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GDSP JSPDF include.GDSP Report Page Content</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency_0429c23cdbd2720054d8ff621f9619cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-20 20:18:31</sys_updated_on></m2m_sp_widget_dependency></record_update>
